text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- U.N. official criticises air embargo on Iraq.
- Egyptian firms to hold an exhibition of medicine in Baghdad.
- Some 150 Lebanese companies to organise food fair in Iraq.
- Preparations are under way in Iraq's port in the Gulf to receive vessels loaded with food and medicine Iraq will buy under the oil-for-food deal signed with the U.N.
- Iraq to attend an Arab symposium on water to be held in Syria on February 17-19.
(The above stories were also carried by IRAQ and QADISSIYA)
